text: Gernot Endemann (24 June 1942 - 29 June 2020) was a German actor. He was at one time married to the French actress Jocelyne Boisseau. His career began in 1965. Endemann was born in Essen, Germany. He was known for his roles in Angels of the Street (1969), Willi Manages The Whole Thing (1972), Shout at the Devil (1976), Mandara (1983) and Der Schatz im Niemandsland (1987). He also played Horsch in the German version of Sesame Street. Endemann died on 29 June 2020 in Hanover, Germany at the age of 77.Schauspieler Gernot Endemann ist tot ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:People from Essen
title: Gernot Endemann
